programme.title: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!

programme.title: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding's beauty prove too enchanting?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!

programme.title: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding's grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos at the altar! Meanwhile, Luffy charges in, adding to the mayhem!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!

programme.title: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!

programme.title: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can't even bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!

programme.title: The plot is in full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister, and Big Mom loses her wits!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!

programme.title: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!

programme.title: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats' plan goes awry, and all hope looks to be lost!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Launcher Blasts! The Moment of Big Mom's Assassination!

programme.title: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom's troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege's stronghold - with the full force of the Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, it's only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!

programme.title: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom's castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can't resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile, the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Escape From the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!

programme.title: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Execution Begins! Luffy's Allied Forces Are Annihilated?!

programme.title: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape, which involves some parting of ways.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Castle Collapses! The Straw Hatâs Great Escape Begins!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Spear of Elbaph! Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!

programme.title: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom's word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!

programme.title: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn't stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses, and Pudding's changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!

programme.title: Mama's onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero's mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!

programme.title: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny's Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!

programme.title: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom's naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure

programme.title: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro's sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm, which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet General, Katakuri!

programme.title: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!

programme.title: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei!

programme.title: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous â but little do they know the plan is overheard!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Threat of the Mole! Luffyâs Silent Fight!

programme.title: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!

programme.title: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile, at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!

programme.title: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

programme.title: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!

programme.title: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile, Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains!

programme.title: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully, but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!

programme.title: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Failure to Communicate
programme.desc: Michaels parents come to visit him, but he is worried about the way they treat each other and how it reflects on his own children; after a disastrous attempt to fix things, Michael and Jay decide to let things the way they are.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Papa Said Knock You Out
programme.desc: Junior asks Michael for boxing lessons so he can protect his sisters honor.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Return of the Wall
programme.desc: Michael steps in to save Kadys soccer team from Janets overbearing coaching style.

programme.title: My Wife and Kids - Working Relationship
programme.desc: Michael seeks advice from Junior on how to handle Janets office persona; the cast re-enacts scenes from the movie E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Big Bold Sandwiches
programme.desc: In this episode Yo-Yo is laying out big bold sandwiches so come hungry. First she builds the showstopper of all subs. Its the perfect sandwich for all types of gatherings, from a Friday night chill out to laying out the best food for a game day.

programme.title: Downright Delicious With Yo-Yo - Meatless Mondays
programme.desc: Our girl Yo-Yo gets in the kitchen with one of Hollywoods leading men. This healthy meal is a plant based delight. She starts off with a charred cauliflower steak with a creamy baby bella mushroom gravy.

programme.title: Urban Indie Film Block - The Power of Resilience
programme.desc: Learning how the way one rises from challenges is what defines them.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Keep It on the Short Grass
programme.desc: Bernie creates a public relations disaster while facing off with Matt Damon and Lucy Lawless in a charity golf tournament.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Sweet Home Chicago
programme.desc: Bernie takes the entire family to Chicago for the funeral of a beloved uncle, but his cousins (Don Cheadle) scheming mars the trip.

programme.title: Best Mattress Topper Ever!

programme.desc: The famed monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula, who is using Dr. Frankensteins research and a werewolf for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: Blink Twice (2024)
programme.desc: When tech billionaire Slater King meets Frida, he invites her to join him and his friends for a dream vacation on his private island. However, when strange things start to happen, shell have to uncover the truth if she hopes to make it out alive.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: Reluctantly pressed into service again, a former military sniper plots revenge against his powerful foes after being betrayed and wounded.

programme.title: White House Down (2013)
programme.desc: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

programme.title: Afterburn (2025)
programme.desc: After a massive solar flare destroys the Eastern Hemisphere, a treasure hunter for hire ventures to Europe to retrieve the coveted Mona Lisa, only to learn that the world needs a hero more than it needs a painting.

programme.title: All the Old Knives (2022)
programme.desc: When the CIA discovers one of its agents leaked information that cost more than 100 people their lives, veteran operative Henry Pelham is assigned to root out the mole with his former lover and colleague Celia Harrison.

programme.title: Tom Clancys Without Remorse (2021)
programme.desc: Seeking justice for the murder of his pregnant wife, an elite Navy SEAL uncovers a covert plot that threatens to engulf the United States and Russia in an all-out war.

programme.title: Smile 2 (2024)

programme.desc: A Hungarian counts (Ralph Fiennes) fling with a British newlywed leads to tragedy in World War II North Africa.

programme.title: Baywatch (2017)

programme.title: The Passenger (2023)
programme.desc: Randy is perfectly content to fade into the background, but when one of his co-workers goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he must face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: Me Before You (2016)
programme.desc: A paralyzed man (Sam Claflin) gets a new lease on life when a cheerful young woman (Emilia Clarke) becomes his caregiver.

programme.title: Emma (1996)
programme.desc: Things keep getting worse after a young matchmaker (Gwyneth Paltrow) finds a mate for a simple young woman (Toni Collette) in rural 1800s England.

programme.title: Bill and Teds Excellent Adventure (1989)
programme.desc: Two dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) go back in time to fetch Beethoven, Napoleon and other biggies for a history project.

programme.title: Bill and Teds Bogus Journey (1991)
programme.desc: The dopey dudes (Keanu Reeves, Alex Winter) beat the Grim Reaper (William Sadler) in a board-game contest, so he must help them stop their evil robot twins.

programme.title: Liar Liar (1997)
programme.desc: A boys birthday wish comes true that his neglectful father, a fast-talking lawyer, cannot tell a lie for 24 hours.

programme.title: Before Dawn (2024)
programme.desc: A young man joins his countrymen on the Western front of World War I, hoping to expedite an end to the bloody conflict. However, as the battle rages on, hes forced to grapple with the brutal realities of trench warfare.

programme.title: Major League (1989)
programme.desc: Lackluster baseball players (Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen) hear their Cleveland teams new owner is counting on them to lose.

programme.title: Grudge Match (2013)
programme.desc: A boxing promoter (Kevin Hart) offers two rival boxers (Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone) the chance to come out of retirement for one final bout.

programme.title: The Other Guys (2010)
programme.desc: Two deskbound detectives get more than they bargain for when they take on a seemingly minor case that may turn out to be New Yorks biggest crime.

programme.title: Fatman (2020)
programme.desc: After receiving a lump of coal in his stocking, a disgruntled 12-year-old hires a highly skilled assassin to kill Santa Claus.

programme.title: Southpaw (2015)
programme.desc: After losing everything to a senseless tragedy, a boxer (Jake Gyllenhaal) turns to a retired fighter (Forest Whitaker) for guidance as he struggles toward redemption.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai (2018)
programme.desc: Terror strikes in the heart of Mumbai, India, as members of Lashkar-e-Taiba storm the Taj Mahal Palace Hotel. Amid the gunfire and mayhem, a brave chef and kitchen worker decide to risk their own lives to try and protect the frightened guests.

programme.title: The Machinist (2004)
programme.desc: Cryptic notes and encounters with a mysterious stranger torment a drill-press operator (Christian Bale) who has not slept in a year.

programme.title: Wolves (2016)
programme.desc: A talented high school basketball players (Taylor John Smith) dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his hard-drinking fathers (Michael Shannon) compulsive gambling.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane (2016)
programme.desc: A woman (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men (John Goodman, John Gallagher Jr.).

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)
programme.desc: A goofy janitor (David Spade) tells a radio talk-show host (Dennis Miller) about his search for the parents who abandoned him.

programme.title: Masterminds (2016)
programme.desc: An armored-car driver (Zach Galifianakis) helps a flirty co-worker (Kristen Wiig) and her friends pull off a heist, then finds himself holding the bag after they double-cross him.

programme.title: American Renegades (2017)

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: Scream (1996)
programme.desc: A psycho killer targets a past victims daughter (Neve Campbell), while a tabloid TV reporter (Courteney Cox) homes in on his identity.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick (2022)
programme.desc: Pete "Maverick" Mitchell keeps pushing the envelope after years of service as one of the Navys top aviators. He must soon confront the past while training a new squad of graduates for a dangerous mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

programme.title: Jack Reacher (2012)
programme.desc: A defense attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: The Contractor (2022)
programme.desc: When his new assignment goes awry, an elite soldier finds himself hunted and on the run, caught in a dangerous conspiracy and fighting to stay alive long enough to get home and uncover the true motives of those who betrayed him.

programme.title: From Dusk Till Dawn (1996)

programme.sub-title: From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money (1999)
programme.desc: A bank robber (Duane Whitaker) headed for a Mexican heist stumbles into a bar frequented by the undead, where hes turned into a vampire.

programme.title: Murder Company (2024)
programme.desc: During the D-Day invasion, a group of U.S. soldiers must smuggle a member of the French resistance behind enemy lines to assassinate a high-value Nazi target.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: The Last Castle (2001)
programme.desc: A court-martialed general (Robert Redford) leads a revolt against a corrupt warden (James Gandolfini) in a military prison.

programme.desc: A U.S. marshal (Wesley Snipes) turns sky diver to nab a hijacker (Gary Busey) and his parachuter gang planning to invade the DEA.

programme.title: Equilibrium (2002)
programme.desc: In the future a government agent (Christian Bale) and a band of rebels battle a regime that uses a drug to suppress peoples emotions.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: Shell (2024)
programme.desc: Desperate to reclaim her career, once-beloved actress Samantha Lake gets drawn into the glamorous world of wellness mogul Zoe Shannon, only to uncover a monstrous truth beneath the seemingly flawless surface.

programme.title: Sinister (2012)
programme.desc: A true-crime novelist (Ethan Hawke) and his family become the targets of a supernatural entity when he uses found footage to unravel the murders of his homes previous occupants.

programme.title: Barrons Cove (2024)
programme.desc: A man with a violent past kidnaps the boy he holds responsible for his sons death. As he grows closer to uncovering the truth, hes left to wonder whether his pursuers are really seeking to protect the boy, or merely the secrets he keeps.

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.sub-title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2007)
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he did not commit, a vengeful barber (Johnny Depp) and his accomplice (Helena Bonham Carter) carve up unlucky customers and bake them in meat pies.

programme.title: Fight or Flight (2024)
programme.desc: A mercenary takes on the job of tracking a high-value asset known only as "The Ghost" on an international flight. Realizing the plane is filled with assassins assigned to kill them both, the pair must work together in a fight for their lives.

programme.title: Twisted (2004)
programme.desc: With help from her partner (Andy Garcia), a police inspector (Ashley Judd) searches for a killer who is murdering her former lovers.

programme.title: Wildcat (2021)
programme.desc: A captive reporter must figure out a way to escape from the militants who ambushed her convoy in the Middle East.

programme.title: Mourning in Lod (2023)
programme.desc: The fates of three families become inextricably intertwined when a Palestinian citizen is killed by a Jewish settler in the city of Lod, Israel, and deadly riots break out.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: The Survivalist (2021)
programme.desc: A year and a half after the fall of civilization due to a viral outbreak, a former FBI agent is forced to protect a young woman immune to the disease from a dangerous gang leader hunting her.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man (2017)
programme.desc: A couple (Douglas Smith, Cressida Bonas) and their friend (Lucien Laviscount) stumble upon the horrific origins of the Bye Bye Man (Doug Jones), a mysterious figure that they discover is the root cause of the evil behind the most unspeakable acts.

programme.title: The Beldham (2024)
programme.desc: A struggling new mother fights a generations-old presence lurking within her familys home, threatening her safety, her sanity, and the life of her infant child.

programme.title: Backcountry (2014)
programme.desc: A couple (Missy Peregrym, Jeff Roop) on a deep-wilderness hike become hopelessly lost within an aggressive black bears territory.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)
